//: === FNF BOT CONFIGURATION ===
This file controls all bot settings. Edit values as needed.
=== TIMING SETTINGS ===
BASE_DELAY_MS: Minimum delay between scanner loops (affects CPU usage)
RELEASE_DELAY_MS: How long to hold each key when a note is detected
HIT_DELAY_MS: Additional delay before pressing key (for timing adjustment)
=== DETECTION SETTINGS ===
COLOR_TOLERANCE: How much color variation to allow (0-255, higher = more lenient)
PADDING: Extra pixels around note detection areas
=== NOTE POSITIONS (X, Y coordinates) ===
These are the screen coordinates where each note appears
Use a color picker tool to find the exact positions in your game
=== NOTE COLORS (R, G, B values) ===
These are the RGB colors of each note when it should be pressed
Use a color picker tool to get the exact colors from your game
=== KEY BINDINGS ===
Which keyboard keys to press for each note direction
Make sure these match your game's key bindings
=== CONTROL SETTINGS ===
FAILSAFE_KEY: Key to hold to exit the bot (emergency stop)
DEBUG: Show detailed console logs (true/false)
=== DEBUG PANEL SETTINGS ===
Control what information is shown in the live status panel
